column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Aang says : " Oh , I did n't see you there . "
#Text=Meng says : " You do n't like me , do you ? "
#Text=Aang says : " Of course I like you . "
#Text=Meng says : " But not the way I like you . "
#Text=Aang says : " Oh , I guess not . "
#Text=Meng says : " It 's okay .
#Text=" Meng says : " She 's beautiful , by the way .
#Text=" Aang says : " Huh ?
#Text=" Meng says : " That Water Tribe girl .
#Text=I can see why you like her so much .
#Text=She 's sweet , she 's a bender and her hair seems so manageable .
#Text=" Aang says : " Do n't worry .
#Text=You 're going to meet a great guy who 's going to completely fall for you .
#Text=I know it .
#Text=" Meng says : " Thanks .
#Text=Wait !
#Text=Do n't you want this ?
#Text=" Aang says : " How did you know ?
#Text=" Meng says : " I 've kind of been stalking you .
#Text=Heh ... " Aang says : " Oh , thanks ... I guess .
#Text="
